AuthorizationHeaderToken.description: API tokens must be prepended with "token" followed by a space.
AuthorizationHeaderToken.name: Authorization

SudoHeader.description: Sudo API request as the user provided as the key. Admin privileges are required.
SudoHeader.name: Sudo

TOTPHeader.description: Must be used in combination with BasicAuth if two-factor authentication is enabled.
TOTPHeader.name: X-GITEA-OTP

apiDescription: This documentation describes the Gitea API.
